abstract.text: Discover how you can get the most out of Xcode Cloud, Apple‚Äôs continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) service. abstract.text: Learn how Xcode Cloud can help teams of all shapes and sizes in their development process. We‚Äôll share different ways to configure actions to help you create simple yet powerful workflows, and show you how to extend Xcode Cloud when you integrate with additional tools.
